string.font: The below key is valid for 24 hours and will be automatically deleted thereafter.

resources.string: Instantly Remotely transfer data via link
For smooth transfer, many permissions are required due to Android limitations.
Needs location access to ensure accurate device discovery and seamless file transfers
Wi-Fi is required for fast and seamless file transfers between devices.
Needed to connect and transfer files with nearby devices.
We do not access or share your personal data.
To provide you with the best experience, this app needs access to your storage to save and manage files.
Please wait, your data is uploading
